conversion_verification.notes: The 3D image is a top-down orthographic render. While walls have height and furniture has volume, it lacks the required angled/isometric perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have height and thickness, but the view is pure top-down orthographic, failing the perspective requirement.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Excellent fidelity to the original layout; wall placement and room proportions are nearly identical.

interior_elements.notes: Almost all furniture matches perfectly in placement and scale.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render, though the lack of angled perspective makes it harder to see the '3D' nature of the walls.

detected_errors.description: Pure top-down orthographic projection used instead of angled/isometric view.

summary: A highly accurate geometric reconstruction that functions as a 3D floor plan but fails to utilize an angled perspective for better depth perception.
